events.message: I recently received my order but the item does not match the description. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible because I am not satisfied with the product quality.
The issue was reviewed and categorized under the Refund cluster due to the customer's request for money back regarding the unsatisfactory product.
The case has been assigned to a customer support agent specialized in refund requests to provide appropriate assistance.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I understand you want to request a refund for your recent order. I’m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and any photos of the item received? This will help us process your refund request more quickly.
Sure, my order number is 789654123, and I have attached several pictures showing the product and its discrepancies from the description.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund for your order. Please expect the amount to be credited back to your original payment method within 5 to 7 business days.
That sounds good, thank you! I appreciate the quick response and the refund solution you’ve proposed.
Your refund has been processed successfully. If you have any other questions or concerns, feel free to reach out to us anytime.
We just wanted to check in to make sure you received your refund and that everything has been settled to your satisfaction.
Since your issue has been resolved and no further response was received, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent a customer satisfaction survey to gather your feedback on our support experience. Your opinion matters to us.
